lines.text: Quoting Bishop Jeremy Taylor, "Marriage hath in it less of beauty but more of safety, than the single life; it hath more care, but less danger, it is more merry, and more sad; it is fuller of sorrows, and fuller of joys; it lies under more burdens, but it is supported by all the strengths of love and charity, and those burdens are delightful."
Sometimes the people we meet change us forever.
I haven't known you that long, but I think there may be something wrong with you.
I don't deserve heaven.
Oh Sarah, you deserve so much more than you think you do.
What other options do we have? We have no options. None!
Yet somehow they seem more appealing than this.

Bridge, ya know, I mean, what I always thought was that there was this one, one perfect person for everybody in the world, you know, and when you found that person, uh, the rest of the world just kinda magically faded away and... and you know, the two of you would just be inside this kind of protective bubble. But there is no bubble, or if there is, we have to make it. I just think life is more than a series of moments, you know, it's... it's... we can make choices and we can choose to protect the people we love and that's what makes us who we are, and those are the real miracles! Stop me when it becomes glaringly obvious that I have no idea what I am talking about...

[arguing with Sarah]
My funeral is gonna be PACKED!
Ben, in about five minutes we're supposed to be joined for eternity and I was wondering, um, if you were gonna get dressed.
Well if it's eternity, it can wait.
[laughs]
There are no more cars... you should have called as soon as you got off the plane.
Ya, you're right. Sorry. I wasn't thinking about that when I was unconscious and bleeding from the head!
Sarah, everybody loves you, you just... you just think they're all wrong.
[Alan taps a glass with a knife, causing it to break]
Okay, I'm not... payin' for that. It was already chipped.
Are you going to be here when I get back?
You know me.
I would not presume.
Two wayward travellers stuck in a Geo with a guy named Vic.
